name: RosesAreRed
0:
”Alexa, open roses are red”
”Alexa, launch roses are red”
”Alexa, play roses are red”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: roses are red
des:
Looking for some downright stupid, but humorous Roses Are Red Poems? Let Alexa read some silly Roses Are Red Poems. Use these poems for inspiration. 

The skill provides users with a Roses Are Red poem. The skill gets updated regularly, so expect new content.

To use simply ask:
"Alexa, open Roses Are Red poems"
"Alexa, launch Roses Are Red"
"Alexa, play Roses Are Red poems"

If you'd like to add any poems, and I will get them added:
http://twitter.com/VikingSkullApps
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
